title: Remote Customer Engagement & Sales Representative
job_overview:
Remote Customer Engagement & Sales Representative (Full-Time)

Compensation: $2/hour (Base Rate + Performance-Based Incentives)

Position Overview:
We are looking for a proactive and articulate Customer Engagement & Sales Representative to join our fully remote team. This position focuses on delivering high-quality support through live chat and messaging platforms, while using consultative sales techniques to align client needs with appropriate offerings. Your role will be pivotal in fostering positive customer experiences and driving conversions.

Key Responsibilities:
•? ?Respond promptly and professionally to customer inquiries via chat and messaging channels.
•? ?Identify customer needs and recommend suitable products or services to maximise satisfaction.
•? ?Develop strong rapport with clients by providing courteous, informed, and efficient service.
*
Core Qualifications:
•? ?Exceptional written communication skills in English, with a friendly yet professional tone.
•? ?Demonstrated success in sales, including achieving or exceeding sales performance targets.
•? ?Previous experience in online customer service, live chat support, or digital sales preferred.
•? ?Self-directed with excellent time management skills and a strong work ethic in remote settings.

Why Join Us:
If you excel at delivering exceptional service, enjoy helping others make informed purchase decisions, and thrive in a remote work environment, we encourage you to apply. This is an opportunity to be part of a supportive team where performance is rewarded and growth is encouraged.
